traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The kruthik has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Tunneler
entries: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The kruthik makes two stab attacks or two spike attacks.

actions.name: Stab
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spike
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
